components: ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,ELECTRICAL SYSTEM,AIR BAGS,TIRES,EQUIPMENT
summary: I OWN A 1998 CHEVY MALIBU.  THIS VEHICLE WILL CUT OFF WHILE DRIVING.  I BOUGHT THIS VEHICLE BRAND NEW IN JUNE 1998 AND HAD TO TAKE IT TO THE SHOP FOR REPAIR THE NEXT MONTH.  THE SERVICE DEPARTMENT AT SHAVER MOTORS HAS NEVER BEEN ABLE TO FIX IT.  THERE IS SOMETHING WRONG WITH THIS CAR'S ELECTRICAL SYSTEM.  I WAS DRIVING IN CHICAGO ON 80 90 TOLL ROAD AND THIS VEHICLE STOPPED FOR NO REASON WHILE I WAS DOING 55 MILES PER HOUR.  I LISTED ONE INCIDENT DATE BUT HAVE HAD NUMEROUS OTHER PROBLEMS.  ALSO, WHEN I FIRST PURCHASED THE VEHICLE I HAD TO REPLACE THE TIRES AFTER LESS THAN 3000 MILES, THEY WERE ALSO BAD.
